SELECT totalTaskCount,taskSuccessCount,taskFailedCount,taskPendingCount,taskRunningCount,ownerCount, dataSupplierCount, powerSupplierCount, receiverCount, algoSupplierCount FROM ( (SELECT COUNT(t.id) AS totalTaskCount, 1 as a FROM task AS t) t1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(t.id) AS taskSuccessCount,1 as a FROM task AS t WHERE t.`status` = 'success') t2 ON t1.a=t2.a LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(t.id) AS taskFailedCount,1 as a FROM task AS t WHERE t.`status` = 'failed') t3 ON t1.a=t3.a LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(t.id) AS taskPendingCount,1 as a FROM task AS t WHERE t.`status` = 'pending') t4 ON t1.a=t4.a LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(t.id) AS taskRunningCount,1 as a FROM task AS t WHERE t.`status` = 'running') t5 ON t1.a=t5.a LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(t.id) AS ownerCount, 1 as a FROM task AS t WHERE t.role = 'owner') t6 ON t1.a = t6.a LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(t.id) AS dataSupplierCount, 1 as a FROM task AS t WHERE t.role = 'dataSupplier') t7 ON t1.a = t7.a LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(t.id) AS powerSupplierCount, 1 as a FROM task AS t WHERE t.role = 'powerSupplier') t8 ON t1.a = t8.a LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(t.id) AS receiverCount, 1 as a FROM task AS t WHERE t.role = 'receiver') t9 ON t1.a = t9.a LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(t.id) AS algoSupplierCount, 1 as a FROM task AS t WHERE t.role = 'algoSupplier') t10 ON t1.a = t10.a )

SELECT CASE WHEN t.owner_Identity_id = (SELECT identity_Id FROM local_org) THEN 1 WHEN tdp.identity_id = (SELECT identity_Id FROM local_org) THEN 2 WHEN tpp.identity_id = (SELECT identity_Id FROM local_org) THEN 3 WHEN trc.consumer_identity_id = (SELECT identity_Id FROM local_org) THEN 4 ELSE 0 END AS role FROM task t LEFT JOIN task_data_provider tdp ON t.task_Id = tdp.task_Id LEFT JOIN task_power_provider tpp ON t.task_Id = tpp.task_Id LEFT JOIN task_result_consumer trc ON t.task_Id = trc.task_Id WHERE t.task_Id = #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
